actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Raw_WeighBridge SET
		DOCKETNO = '{{update_form.fieldState.DOCKETNO.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DOCKETNO : update_form.sourceData.DOCKETNO}}',
		TRANSACTTYPE = '{{update_form.fieldState.TRANSACTTYPE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.TRANSACTTYPE : update_form.sourceData.TRANSACTTYPE}}',
    DOCKETTYPE = '{{update_form.fieldState.DOCKETTYPE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DOCKETTYPE : update_form.sourceData.DOCKETTYPE}}',
		INWARDLOAD = '{{update_form.fieldState.INWARDLOAD.isVisible ? update_form.formData.INWARDLOAD : update_form.sourceData.INWARDLOAD}}',
		SITEPREFIX = '{{update_form.fieldState.SITEPREFIX.isVisible ? update_form.formData.SITEPREFIX : update_form.sourceData.SITEPREFIX}}',
		BUSINESS = '{{update_form.fieldState.BUSINESS.isVisible ? update_form.formData.BUSINESS : update_form.sourceData.BUSINESS}}',
		TRANSDATE = '{{update_form.fieldState.TRANSDATE.isVisible ? update_form.formData.TRANSDATE : update_form.sourceData.TRANSDATE}}',
		REGISTRATIONNO = '{{update_form.fieldState.REGISTRATIONNO.isVisible ? update_form.formData.REGISTRATIONNO : update_form.sourceData.REGISTRATIONNO}}',
		CONFIGURATION = '{{update_form.fieldState.CONFIGURATION.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CONFIGURATION : update_form.sourceData.CONFIGURATION}}',
		CUSTOMER = '{{update_form.fieldState.CUSTOMER.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CUSTOMER : update_form.sourceData.CUSTOMER}}',
		CONTACTNAME = '{{update_form.fieldState.CONTACTNAME.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CONTACTNAME : update_form.sourceData.CONTACTNAME}}'
  WHERE DOCKETNO = {{data_table.selectedRow.DOCKETNO}};
